title: Looking for a plat support main to grind with during the school holidays
body: I'm currently on a huge slump and am hardstuck plat 3-4. I am looking for a duo partner to hopefully be able to reach diamond with during the school holidays. Would prefer if you could play champs such as Braum, Tahm Kench, Rakan, Alistar and Lulu. If you're interested in playing with me please chuck me a friend request :D

replies.body: I can play all these champs. But if you are good ADC, and I play Thresh, we will be Challenger soon.
